personal.name: Maheshwor Tiwari
personal.title: Data Analyst | AI Engineer
personal.tagline: From Quantum Physics to Data Science: Turning Complex Data into Actionable Business Insights

about.short: PhD-trained Data Analyst with 2+ years transforming complex data into strategic business insights. Specializing in Python automation, SQL optimization, and interactive dashboards across property, healthcare, and construction sectors.
valueProps: 2+ years building data pipelines, dashboards, and ML models that reduce costs 30% and improve accuracy to 99%
PhD-level analytical rigor applied to practical business challenges: From quantum mechanics to business intelligence
Full-stack data professional: Python/SQL → ETL pipelines → Tableau/Power BI → Stakeholder presentations

achievements: Evaluated and improved AI model responses by assessing accuracy, quality, and alignment with user expectations
Developed and tested training prompts to identify AI performance gaps and enhance model capabilities
Provided detailed feedback and evaluation on AI training projects, contributing to the development of more reliable AI systems
Designed Python ML models for predictive analytics, enabling data-driven decisions that improved forecasting accuracy by 25%
Built automated data pipelines that improved efficiency by 30%, reducing manual processing time from 8 hours to 5.6 hours weekly
Developed interactive dashboards using Matplotlib and Seaborn, improving stakeholder engagement and decision-making speed
Automated data extraction for population datasets using Python, improving accuracy by 20% and team collaboration
Built Power BI dashboards that reduced client reporting time by 30%, from 10 hours to 7 hours per week
Optimized customer support response times through data analysis, improving operational efficiency by 15%
Managed and mentored 60+ students across class 11 and 12 Physics and Mathematics courses, developing strong classroom management skills and adapting teaching methods to diverse learning styles
Demonstrated leadership through curriculum development, student mentorship, and collaborative planning with faculty, enhancing communication skills and building rapport with students and colleagues
Utilized advanced Python programming for computational modeling and solving complex research problems
Developed Python-based workflows to manage and analyze large datasets across multiple research projects
Presented Python-enabled research findings at international conferences, demonstrating technical expertise and communication skills
Led engaging physics tutorials for master's students, enhancing understanding and promoting teamwork
Designed course materials, assignments, and exams, strengthening the learning experience
Mentored students on projects, collaborated with faculty, and fostered student engagement
Developed proficiency in Python programming by researching the effect of magnetic fields on 2D materials
Managed and analysed complex data sets, improving their accuracy and reliability
Used dashboard using Power BI to present research findings and participated in weekly reviews, improving collaboration and research skills

projects.title: Real-Time Corrosion Detection using YOLOv8n
projects.description: Optimized AI model for industrial infrastructure inspection using deep learning and computer vision techniques
impact: Reduced model size by 11.39% while maintaining detection accuracy
Improved inference time by 39.34% for real-time edge device deployment
Achieved 89/100 grade with only 7.43% precision trade-off

projects.title: A Comparative Study for Machine Learning Models for Predicting Obesity
projects.description: Comparative analysis of Logistic Regression, Decision Tree, and Random Forest to predict obesity levels using lifestyle and demographic attributes.
impact: Decision Tree achieved 94.10% accuracy at max depth 9

projects.title: CV Agent - AI-Powered Resume Builder
projects.description: Intelligent CV creation tool using AI to optimize resumes for ATS systems and specific job requirements
impact: AI-driven content suggestions improving resume quality

projects.title: Diagnosing Parkinson's Disease using Voice Sample Data Analysis
projects.description: Non-invasive PD diagnosis approach using acoustic features from voice samples; analyzes key speech-based indicators and outlines a path to reliable screening.
impact: Identified key acoustic markers: MaxPitch, StdDevPitch, Jitter(%), UPDRS
Demonstrated feasibility of voice-based PD screening
Provides basis for ML modeling and clinical validation

education.thesis: Mean-field theory for quantum spin systems and the magnetocaloric effect
